title: Temporary People Operations Coordinator
content:
Contract Duration: 3 months; 40 hrs/wk
Overview:
Lattice is seeking a Temporary People Operations Coordinator for a 3 month contract. This role will support day-to-day People Team operations, processes, and programs. 
Responsibilities:

 Support day-to-day people operations

This includes onboarding, offboarding, leaves of absence, and more
Responding to employee questions and helping resolve issues quickly


Data Reporting and auditing

Generate and audit reports
Perform data quality checks and address any discrepancies or errors


Process improvements and documentation

Propose and implement enhancements to improve efficiency, security, and data accuracy
Maintain detailed documentation and help maintain our Lattice Compass, our employee resource center


Collaboration and Communication:

Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to resolve issues
Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders to provide updates, address concerns, and seek necessary approvals



Requirements:

1-3 years of work experience in HR, Recruiting or a similar role
Strong problem solving skills and a customer-service orientation
Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders.
Ability to handle confidential and sensitive information with discretion
Knowledge of basic HR and administrative principles
 Ability to prioritize tasks, manage deadlines, and handle multiple file transfer requests simultaneously
Resourceful, willing to hit the ground running and work with your peers to tackle the unknown
Reporting and auditing experience is a bonus

Note: This is a temporary position focused focused on supporting People Operations with the potential to extend. 
The estimated hourly rate for this role is $35/hour. This position is also eligible for incentive stock options, subject to the terms of Lattice‚Äôs applicable plans.
